title: It’s time for February bundles and Mystery skins!

replies.body: So where is Urgot in "Kill them with Cuteness Bundle" Hmm? Riot isn't taking my wallet this time it seems....{{champion:6}}

Dude, it's fine.
Riot just.....f {{champion:6}}
Yeah... Where's the old Lollipoppy? {{champion:78}} {{item:3070}}
I bought lollipoppy literally a week before the visual rework. {{champion:78}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
except that it wasn't available so; that's a lie.
It was on sale for the harrowing event.
Well, the thing is, they use the current splash art is promotional things like this and Lollipoppy is _actually_ a decently cute skin. So, there isn't really any irony in it anymore.
MITOCHONDRIA IS THE POWERHOUSE OF THE CELL.
Indeed {{champion:74}}
Incorrect. Saying the mitochondria is the powerhouse is like saying a hose=water.

I know this is going to be downvoted forever, but Limited Edition skin owners are still waiting for that survey Hippalus promised 2 years ago.

And we're still waiting for proper compensation -- a tiered icon and an in-game emote when using those skins would be more than enough.

Come on Riot, keep your promises!
I don't know what this is from but I support the fight  #HippalusPromised

> [{quoted}](name=xColdxBloodx,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=IzTAaIEN,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-02-18T19:21:22.999+0000)
>
> I don't know what this is from but I support the fight  #HippalusPromised

It is in regards to Limited Edition skins coming back. There were a group of skins Riot promised they'd never bring back... and then they did 4 years later. They gave refunds and a special loading watermark, but they promised to do more to "make it right" and never did.
Which skins?

> [{quoted}](name=Draconian Killer,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=IzTAaIEN,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2016-02-21T13:37:05.999+0000)
>
> Which skins?

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/plan-vintage-limited-edition-skins
YAY MYSTERY SKINS ARE BACK TIME TO GET CRAPPY SKINS LIKE BATTLECAST {{champion:6}} , AND FREAKIN CAMMANDO  {{champion:99}}
battlecast {{champion:6}} doesn't suck.....
giant enemy crabgot is where its at

*buys 490rp mystery skin*
*gets Spirit Guard {{champion:77}} *
gg
I gifted my friend a mystery skin and that is exactly what he got. We basically just blew up at that moment.
I didn't even think that was possible...

Flashy Fighters huh

more like d-bags bundle amiright?

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=IzTAaIEN,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-02-18T20:10:07.389+0000)
>
> Flashy Fighters huh
> 
> more like d-bags bundle amiright?

Nope.
"The D-Bags Bundle" is that one bundle that includes all the champions* because they all like to gang up and ambush, beat on, and rob 300g from people who are walking through the woods by themselves.


*Nasus not included.  Some assembly required.
{{champion:6}} to be kidding me.{{champion:103}} that far in the year already??
{{summoner:21}} I..... must....resist....
So I opened a 760 mystery crate, I have no clue why, I am a scrub at the game, and i got project yi. Is that good?{{champion:11}}
its his best skin

This scrub has obviously never seen the new Assassin Yi splash art

definitely his best skin no contest
you got a legendary for skin for less than half the original price, that's a steal
"flashy fighters" could be renamed to "faker could have 10 hp and beat you in a 1v1 with any of these champions"
No Teemo in cuteness bundle? {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}}
No, Teemo is in the demonic set, as the most prominent champ in there.
Why is Cryocore Brand in Blast from the Past? Probably the "Blast" part...
jurassic kog'maw would have been better in my opinion
I'm assuming it's because you can use cryonics to preserve stuff and things.  Brand has been preserved cryogenically from the past?  Star Wars had that tech "a long time ago." lol
Ice age probably with that skin being all...icy I guess.
He's the ice age!
He's Mr. Freeze from "Batman and Robin", which came out over 20 years ago.
Looking for Lollipoopy. Not there. Won't buy anything but that.

dude get project zed so much better{{champion:238}} 
{{summoner:14}} {{item:1412}} jg zed op
I was gonna buy Officer Vi tomorrow but bought a mystery skin and got Neon strike instead,I call worth
Much better skin. And you can toggle the glasses to be either on her head or on her face, which I think is cool.
Why is gangster twitch not in the kill them with cuteness bundle? {{champion:117}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:16}}
So I got striker {{champion:81}} as a mystery skin I have never seen it before is that a good skin?
All the Striker skins are in the Legacy vault and won't be released until the next World Cup. So I'd say that's a nice find.
will mystery chest give legacy skin?
Are legacy skins available in these chests?
Mystery Chest gave me Super Teemo...Super Satan!

I find it just hilarious that I'm about to buy Riven with IP then get Arcade later. Then they go and put her in a bundle, with arcade, and a bunch of skins I don't want. I would get it for Yas and Zed, but not their ugly skins. Like ty Rito. Ty.
